channel.title: Server Close's Error (Please Help)
channel.description:
Hello guys i have a server with like 30 players on we are new and i leave my computer hosting 24/7 although sometimes i come back to my computer to find this
[img]http://prntscr.com/6pkhh[/img] [url=http://prntscr.com/6pkhh]http://prntscr.com/6pkhh[/url]
Why does it do this!? Because this is losing me loads of players and really need to fix this... It just save's game for everyone and shuts down? :S
Please Help! Thanks Max
